sentences.base_language: hello, my name is seth.
What is your name?
I am from the united states.
but I live in Uruguay.
I'm trying to learn spanish.
Do you want to learn with me?
My girlfriend is named Kayla.
She is a nice woman.
We like to go on walks.
We like to cook together.
She is a really good chef.
sentences.target_language: Ella es una muy buena cocinera.

sentences.base_language: I am not a great chef but I have a secret trick.
sentences.target_language: No soy un gran cocinero pero tengo un truco secreto.

sentences.base_language: I use a lot of Siracha sauce!
My best friend is Jeff.
Yes, the jeff that made this app.
sentences.target_language: Sí, el Jeff que hizo esta aplicación.

sentences.base_language: He works as a programmer.
I have many other friends too.
Stephen and Leslie are very nice.
sentences.target_language: Stephen y Leslie son muy simpáticos.

sentences.base_language: They do a lot of hobbies.
Leslie can make really pretty costumes.
sentences.target_language: Leslie puede hacer disfraces muy bonitos.

sentences.base_language: Stephen likes music festivals.
sentences.target_language: A Stephen le gustan los festivales de música.

sentences.base_language: Together they are a lot of fun.
What are your friends like? Do you have a boyfriend or girlfriend?
sentences.target_language: ¿Cómo son tus amigos? ¿Tienes novio o novia?
